query:
CREATE TABLE `task_contracts` (
  `id` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `goal` text NOT NULL,
  `acceptedOutputs` text NOT NULL,
  `knownRisks` text NOT NULL,
  `nextAction` text NOT NULL,
  `constraints` text NOT NULL,
  `priority` enum('critical','high','medium','low') NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','accepted','completed','failed','rejected') NOT NULL,
  `createdBy` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `acceptedBy` varchar(255),
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `acceptedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `completedAt` timestamp NULL,
  `actualOutputs` text,
  `failureReason` text,
  `rejectionReason` text,
  `context` text,
  `parentContractId` varchar(255),
  `childContractIds` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `status_idx` (`status`),
  KEY `created_by_idx` (`createdBy`),
  KEY `accepted_by_idx` (`acceptedBy`),
  KEY `created_at_idx` (`createdAt`)
);
command:

  `failureReason` text,
  `rejectionReason` text,
  `context` text,
  `parentContractId` varchar(255),
  `childContractIds` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `status_idx` (`status`),
  KEY `created_by_idx` (`createdBy`),
  KEY `accepted_by_idx` (`acceptedBy`),
  KEY `created_at_idx` (`createdAt`)
);
